document_data.name: Orcusword
document_data.mainbody: The '''Orcusword ''' was the weapon of [[Orcus]] when he was a [[balor]]. It was a ''+6 chaotic consumptive burst unholy [[greatsword]]'' that granted [[Divine magic|divine]] spellcasters (via Orcus himself) access to the [[Chaos domain|Chaos]] and [[Undeath domain]]s. It was kept on the [[Negative Energy plane]] in the [[Tchian-Sumere]] citadel, guarded by [[Alzogra]] the Bloated and [[Yleris]], a [[yugoloth]] [[necromancer]].{{Cite dragon/359/1d20 Villains: D&D's Most Wanted; Preferably Dead|62}}
